410680.name: Angels That Kill Demo
410680.description:
Angels That Kill - The Final Cut is a dark, first person adventure game. It tells the story of two men as they uncover the truth behind a murder that has shaken the city. Play through both sides of the story and discover the truth behind the murder.

Play as James Baley, a drunk and drug-ridden retired boxer who has lost everything and moved to Noll City to start again. Go through the first day, interact with the population and make decisions that could affect a number of people. Hide, run, explore, and discover while becoming a part in Noll City in this tragic time.

In the demo you will be able to:
  • Start exploring your options.
    Just because there is a story doesn't mean that you cant help make it, choose between right and wrong, make decisions you didn't mean to, and discover your own beginning to this story.
  • Explore the world.
    It might not be the biggest game ever made, but it is packed full of secrets and goodies waiting to be discovered.
  • Immerse in a noire inspired world.
    Every aspect of the game has been carefully detailed to appeal to any noire(or noir) lover.
  • Change the world to your choosing.
    You have the ability to change the amount of rainfall, the amount of fog, the lighting, and more.
